definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: It is located in the Sheshan Songjiang district, in the Western outskirts of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 天马赛车场坐落于上海市西郊的松江区。

sentences.english: CTCC Round 7 event will be held on 16th Oct, at GuangDong International Circuit, GuangDong.
sentences.chinese: 第七分站将在广东国际赛车场举行。

sentences.english: Shanghai International Circuit is severe on tyres.
sentences.chinese: 上海国际赛车场对轮胎要求很高。

sentences.english: The Shanghai International Circuit will be open for practice.
sentences.chinese: 上海国际赛车场开放赛道供驻场车队练习。

sentences.english: The Shanghai International Circuit was designed as the race circuit for the new millennium.
sentences.chinese: 上海国际赛车场是为迎接新千年到来而设计的赛道。

sentences.english: In Olympic Cycling, the races are held in a velodrome.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会自行车比赛是在一个赛车场。

sentences.english: Racetracks and perhaps airports could have slot machines.
sentences.chinese: 这就有可能在赛车场或者飞机场都设有老虎机。

sentences.english: CTCC Round 4 will be held on 10th Jul, at Odors International Circuit, Neimenggu.
sentences.chinese: 第四分站将在鄂尔多斯国际赛车场举行。

sentences.english: Welcome to Silverstone - The Home of British Motor Racing.
sentences.chinese: 写在英国著名的银石赛车场正门上方。

definition: supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]

pinyin: A1 er3 fa3 · Luo2 mi4 ou1

definition: supercar/abbr. for 超級跑車|超级跑车[chao1 ji2 pao3 che1]
time trial (e.g. in cycle race)/timed race/competition against the clock
racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
